name: Random Password Generator
description: This app generates a unique random  password that satisfied a set of criteria chosen by user through a series of prompts.

name: The Weather Dashboard
description: This app retireves weather data of a city and persisted data to be recalled from the displayed historical list.

name: Team Project: The Gifd of Food
description: This application utilizes two different server side API to handle the task. It performs recipe searches and retrieves random gifs images. Using local storage, selected recipe can be saved and recalled.

name: Team Project: gifNjelly
description: Using Sequelize ORM and Passport authentication, this application functioned as a member based online social interaction platform. It processes a sign-up/log-in that is autheticated to restrict access. This app is deployed on Heroku platform.
